title: Too much flashing in Control Example
description: There is excessive flashing in the Control Example.
OB: When running the Control Example and resizing the window in the vertical direction only, it is observed that all tabs in the TabFolder and all Frames continuously flash.
EB: The expected behavior is that there should be no excessive flashing of tabs in the TabFolder and Frames when resizing the window in the vertical direction.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Run the Control Example. 
2. Resize the window in the vertical direction only. 
3. Observe that all tabs in the TabFolder and all Frames flash continuously.
